attributes.action: force employers to make fairer contributions to employee's pensions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently it is very unfair. Large
organisations contribute to their employee's pensions. Small organisations do not as there is no legal obligation and little union pressure.  The law should be changed so that every employer should have to make at least a modest
contribution.  This is the main reason why many people end up with no pension
other than the State Pension which is quite inadequate on its own.  This would
save the government money in income support for the retired and ignificantly
reduce the misery of the elderly. It would cost the government nothing.  The
smaller organisations may not be too pleased but surely they would have some
concern for the future of their loyal employees without whom they could not
operate.
